T

TouchGestureControlOverlay - Class in com.google.marvin.widget
A transparent overlay which catches all touch events and uses a call back to return the gesture that the user performed.
TouchGestureControlOverlay(Context, TouchGestureControlOverlay.GestureListener) - Constructor for class com.google.marvin.widget.TouchGestureControlOverlay
 
TouchGestureControlOverlay(Context) - Constructor for class com.google.marvin.widget.TouchGestureControlOverlay
 
TouchGestureControlOverlay.Gesture - Enum in com.google.marvin.widget
An enumeration of the possible gestures.
TouchGestureControlOverlay.GestureListener - Interface in com.google.marvin.widget
The callback interface to be used when a gesture is detected.
